settings.title: We've done the science to help you drink brilliantly

settings.editor: A new age of filtration is here. Enjoy crisp drinking water at home and on the go.
Our innovative plant-based filters are independently tested to NSF/ANSI 42, 53 and 401 standards to be effective against a wide range of pollutants.
Pure-tasting water provides better-tasting coffee, tea, smoothies—everything—for a healthier, more sustainable lifestyle. Don’t settle for anything less.
Here's a look at our third-party lab testing across a range of contaminants.
View full report

settings.title: Nano Zero filter technology is available in

settings.editor: Proprietary PureVis™ technology improves the quality of your water at home and on the go.
Non-toxic way to clean your water and bottle.
PureVis™ activates at the touch or self-cleans in the background to help keep your water cleaner.

settings.title: Antimicrobial efficacy of the LARQ Bottle PureVis™ 500ml/17oz against E. coli.

settings.editor: The purpose of this study was to test the effectiveness of the UV-C function in LARQ's Pitcher PureVis™ at inhibiting the growth of, and deactivation of aqueous heterotrophic bacteria in water samples.
The graphs show that the LARQ Pitcher PureVis™’s UV-C function both inhibited the growth of, and achieved detectable reduction of aqueous heterotrophic bacteria vs. the controls.

LARQ Bottle PureVis™ 500ml against E. coli
LARQ Bottle PureVis™ 500ml against  Salmonella
Various LARQ Bottles against E.coli
We put the LARQ Bottle to the test and the results are crystal clear. A cleaner bottle = pristine drinking water.
View full report
Track, monitor, and manage your LARQ Pitcher with the LARQ app. Think of it as your very own hydration control center.
Track your water intake. Your hydration goal is our hydration goal.
Intelligent filter life tracking based on your household water consumption so you know exactly when to replace the filter.

Ever wonder how much water you're drinking? The LARQ app will tell you, broken down to digestible insights.

settings.editor: Get running totals of your impact since switching to LARQ. No turning back now.
How many months has it been? Let the app tell you when to change your filter.
